tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Bhardwaj is a friendly doctor and has  great concern for patients. Whenever i have queries, she answers them patiently. She is very professional, polite, smart and very presentable. I was opting for tooth color braces but she told me to go for metal braces despite the fact that the latter is cheaper. She is very clear in explaining my oral health issues like i have initial cavities and its remedies, me having a milk tooth still above my permanent tooth. Also she explained me meticulously the treatment procedure like first the braces will be fixed, then the milk tooth extraction will be done. I will always recommend Dr. Bhardwaj to all my known people. Thank you Doctor 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was satisfied with the treatment.The scaling was done in 2 sitting by the assistant. I wish the dr herself did it, but it's fine. Now my teeth are clean. I would highly recommend this dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: she was really prompt with her instructions and explained the situation of my mother's wisdom tooth. She also did an x-ray at micro level to be sure what treatment would be needed for my mother. She is friendly and also provided her number to connect if we need any further assistance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To start with, the clinic is very clean with modern equipment. Dr Juneja is very friendly and gentle. She explained the issues I had and gave me the options for treatment stating the pros and cons of each, allowing me to take a well-informed decision. *** ********* ******** *** ********* *** I have not had the problem since then.The best part is that Dr Juneja followed up post visitation to see how I was doing. That kind of care, to me, is very important.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
